# PinFlow - LLM Documentation Index

This file provides a complete map of PinFlow documentation for LLMs building projects with this library.

## Quick Start
- Main Documentation: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/README.md

## Core Concepts & API Reference
The README.md contains everything you need:
- The prep-exec-post pipeline architecture
- Node class API reference
- Store (shared state) pattern
- Flow control (actions, KILL symbol)
- Error handling & retry configuration
- Complete API reference

## Example Documentation

- Single Node: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/single-node.md
- Parallel Execution: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/parallel-execution.md
- Workflow Building: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/workflow.md
- Agent Building: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/agent.md
- Multi-Agent Systems: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/multi-agent.md
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation): https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/rag.md
- Map-Reduce: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/map-reduce.md
- Node Configuration: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/node-configuration.md
- Retry & Fallback: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/retry-fallback.md
- Structured Output: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/docs/examples/structured-output.md

## Working Code Examples

### Full Application
- Chat Agent Example: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/examples/chat-agent/README.md
  (Complete working example with tool use and conversation history)

### Test Files (Real Implementation Examples)
All tests use the library in realistic scenarios:
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/agent.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/workflow.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/parallel-execution.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/retry-fallback.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/multi-agent.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/rag.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/map-reduce.test.ts
- https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/tests/structured-output.test.ts

## Source Code
- Main Library: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adotg/pinflow/master/src/index.ts
  (Single-file implementation ~3kb, excellent for understanding internals)

## Usage Instructions for LLMs

When building projects with PinFlow:
1. Start by reading README.md for core concepts
2. Check relevant example docs for your use case
3. Reference test files for real implementation patterns
4. The library has ZERO dependencies and works in both Node.js and browser

## Key Principles
- Single Node abstraction for everything
- prep() yields items → exec() processes in parallel → post() aggregates
- Store object shared across entire workflow
- Return action strings from post() for conditional routing
- Built-in retry logic with configurable fallbacks
- No LLM abstraction - you control all LLM calls directly
